DOC.brief_title: A Study on β-elemene as Maintain Treatment for Complete Remission Patients of Newly Diagnosed Malignant Gliomas Following Standard Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: This study is being conducted to help determine whether β-elemene as maintain treatment for complete remission patients of newly diagnosed malignant gliomas following standard treatment, is able to delay tumor growth, or impact how long people with newly diagnosed high-grade glioma. β-elemene will be given 600mg/d,d1-14,q28 days for 6 cycles.
